div.p: Philopator alias Theogenous arouras 27¼ artabas of wheat 64½ shoreland of Sok(nopaiou) [Ne]s(os) Aion son of Syros (ar.) 2 (art. of wheat) 4 Satabous son of Horion and Petesouchos son of Gameas (ar.) 8 (art. of wheat) 18 Asklas son of Esouris (ar.) [x] (art. of wheat) 4[(?)] Apynchis son of Syros (ar.) 2 (art. of wheat) [y]. Heron son of Paiamis (ar.) 1 [(art. of wheat) y] Pnepheros Moueis son of Isch[yras (ar.) x (art. of wheat) y] [Petes]ouchos son of S[... (ar.) x (art. of wheat) y]. Translation: R.P. Salomons, ZPE 204 (2017) p. 200
